plot: After Mr. Burns steals oil from Springfield Elementary and blocks out the sun, an unknown person shoots him.

After he stole the oil underneath Springfield Elementary and blocked out the sun, the people of Springfield become fed up with Mr. Burns. The wily old miser has taken to carrying around a gun with him. The other town residents have guns, too. One fateful night, Marge finds Mr. Burns shot. Who did it? Homer? Grandpa? Barney? Moe? Skinner? Smithers? Snake? Dr. Hibbert? Bumblebee Man?

Mr. Burns plots to siphon the oil well underneath Springfield Elementary, and in doing so costs Groundskeeper Willie his job, robs the school of music, wrecks Bart's tree house, and wrecks the old folk's home. Then he blocks out the sun to provide all the power himself, which causes outrage. He's shot by a mystery assailant, but who IS it?—movieguy3

Mr Burns is shot by a mystery assailant after breaking into Springfield's bad books by stealing Springfield Elementary's oil well and blocking out the most important part of life... the sun. Because he's in everyone's bad books it'll be extremely hard to find out who the heck shot Burns.—movieguy3
